1.command:
import takTools.rigging.autoRigging as ar
import imp
imp.reload(ar)

try:
    arui.close()
    arui.deleteLater()
except:
    pass

arui = ar.ui.mainUI.MainUI()
arui.show()

19.annotation: Transfer selected transform channel values to the parent.
19.command:

import imp
imp.reload(tu)
